692bbfb36719c7b398cb0c8e206b926c0fab475e.query:
UPDATE
                race_candidates
            SET
                votes = $1
            WHERE
                candidate_id = $2
            RETURNING race_id

fce572fca4689baee4735aa6ae6c6abc9e38fa39.query:
UPDATE race
            SET total_votes = $1,
                winner_id = (SELECT candidate_id FROM race_candidates WHERE race_id = $2 ORDER BY votes DESC LIMIT 1)
            WHERE id = $2
